source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a black-and-white, low-angle shot of a multi-story building with ornate, arched windows. The building is shown in a state of catastrophic collapse. Its facade crumbles away, revealing the interior structure and a small figure inside, as debris and dust explode outwards. The video captures the dynamic motion of the building's destruction.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a black-and-white, low-angle shot of a multi-story building with ornate, arched windows. The building is shown in a state of catastrophic collapse. Its facade crumbles away, revealing the interior structure and a small figure inside, as debris and dust explode outwards. The video captures the dynamic motion of the building's destruction.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides past a row of parked cars on a city street. One cyclist veers off the road and stops to check a flat tire, while the others continue pedaling in a straight line. Pedestrians cross the street behind them as the cyclists move out of view.
